thread.section_title: Allen School of Health Sciences Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Allen School of Health Sciences | allenschool.edu
thread.title: Susan Leonard
thread.title_full: Allen School of Health Sciences reviewed by Susan Leonard

author: Susan Leonard
title: Susan Leonard
text:
I had attended Allen School for Health Sciences for the Certificate Program and the Associates Degree Program, and it is one of the best decisions I have made in my life. It is a change of career, and I feel so prepared to go out and find and work in a job of medical insurance billing and coding. I am very grateful to all the instructors that have provided me with so much information and guidance in each course I took. I have never had a problem getting any kind of help I needed from the administrative staff.
Thank you very much.
